reviews.review_msg: Scott is a great guy and an extremely helpful instructor, he is willing to go above and beyond to help his students understand the subject, he will leave no one behind. His lectures are never dull because he just knows what you need to learn and will make sure you do. Don't hesitate to choose him as your instructor.
Great lecturer. Explains concepts very clearly and is willing to repeat if you do not understand. Very clear on what to expect on test and lectures are made interesting too.
